content: --आमय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} free from disease or illness, sound, healthy, hale {2} untainted, pure. {3} guileless. {4} free from defects or blemishes. {5} full, complete. {6} infallible. {7} not liable to failure or miscarriage. (--यः, --यं freedom from disease or illness, health, well-being, welfare, happiness. (--यः {1} a wild goat. {2} a hog or boar.
